trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a class converts property change events to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref> events.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> interface is typically implemented together with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface and indicates that the list converts property change events to <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> events.
You rarely need to implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> interface.

However, for performance purposes, your data source should implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> if it provides the functionality described previously, and your data source is interacting with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component, because this functionality is built into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents"></xref> object raises <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref> events.

`true` if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents"></xref> object raises <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref> events when one of its property values changes; otherwise, `false`.
